# Bottle Welcome Template

A minimal yet polished landing page for Bottle projects generated by Projex CLI.

## Colors
- Primary: `#003D5B`
- Secondary: `#00B4D8`
- Accent: `#90E0EF`
- Background: Light `#F8F9FA` / Dark `#0D2535`

## Integration
See `integration.py` for a tiny app that returns the HTML at `/` and JSON at `/api`.

## Customize
- Edit CSS variables in `:root`
- Adjust feature cards and links

## Assets
- Inter font (Google Fonts)
- Font Awesome (CDN)
